title: Spacious Edgewater Condo w Washer and Dryer
posting_body: SPACIOUS 2 bdrm, 1 bath, CONDO FOR RENT On corner of Lake Ave and W. 110th St.
Large living room and large bedroom.
ft. total Lots of storage space including attic.

Unit located on the 2nd floor of a small 2-story Condominium Building Surrounded by mansions in a beautiful neighborhood Neutrally decorated and clean Central Heating and Air-conditioning Electric Range, Refrigerator, and Dishwasher Walking distance to Lake Erie and Edgewater Park/Beach Walking distance to: CVS, Starbucks, Chipotle, Lucky's Supermarket, Clifton Mini Mart, Anytime Fitness, Liquid Planet, Twist, several banks, several restaurants, pizzeria, diners, hair and beauty salons, barbershop, tanning, kindergarten, etc Close to Shoreway (OH-2) Only 5 minutes by car from Downtown life and sports events Frequent and fast public transportation (10 min ride) to Downtown 5 minutes to: Target, 24h Giant Eagle, Marc's, Aldi, Home Depot and Lakewood bars
